1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: The program offers results and statistics from various disciplines and reaches the least explored areas of sport. Learn about the training, the cases of doping and everything that surrounds the world of sport and its players.

imdb.plot outline: Destino Deporte is the journalistic program that outstrips the results and statistics of the different disciplines to get into the less explored territories of sports activity. The life stories of those who train the whole year from sunrise to sunset for a competition of no more than 20 seconds; sports as a social inclusion or as a pivot for culture; excessive competitiveness and the consequent doping cases; the drama that every athlete experiences when it's time to retire. All the edges of the sport will take place in Destino Deporte through research, with information and objective data, with opinion and with the sensitivity to understand the different duties and surrounding that distinguish the sport.
imdb.title: Destino Deporte
plot: Explore sports from the furthest regions of Latin America in this international series that focuses on athletes, issues, and more.

_Destino Deporte_ (qv) is the journalistic program that outstrips the results and statistics of the different disciplines to get into the less explored territories of sports activity. The life stories of those who train the whole year from sunrise to sunset for a competition of no more than 20 seconds; sports as a social inclusion or as a pivot for culture; excessive competitiveness and the consequent doping cases; the drama that every athlete experiences when it's time to retire. All the edges of the sport will take place in _Destino Deporte_ (qv) through research, with information and objective data, with opinion and with the sensitivity to understand the different duties and surrounding that distinguish the sport.::HBO Latin America
